explains: n. 肥料，化肥；受精媒介物
wordGroup: organic fertilizer 有机肥；有机肥料；有机质
nitrogen fertilizer 氮肥；氮肥肥料
urea fertilizer 尿素；尿素肥料

sentences.en: The company said it will stop producing fertilizer in 1990 because of continued losses.
sentences.cn: 该公司称，由于持续亏损而将于1990年停止生产化肥。

sentences.en: A top dressing of fertilizer should be added to improve growth as mint impoverishes the soil quickly.
sentences.cn: 应施顶肥以促进生长，因为薄荷会使土壤迅速变得贫瘠。

sentences.en: The tractor hauled the fertilizer away.
